thread.title: Re: NATION IN CRISIS: Presidential tradition of filling out NCAA bracket for ESPN dies with Trump
thread.title_full: Re: NATION IN CRISIS: Presidential tradition of filling out NCAA bracket for ESPN dies with Trump

author: Deplorable Me - NLJR
title: Re: NATION IN CRISIS: Presidential tradition of filling out NCAA bracket for ESPN dies with Trump
text:
NATION IN CRISIS: Presidential tradition of filling out NCAA bracket for ESPN dies with Trump Posted at 8:15 pm on February 15, 2017 by Brett T. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Donald Trump has managed to outlast scandal after scandal, from commenting on Alicia Machado’s weight gain to allegedly colluding with senior Russian intelligence officials during his campaign. But with a New York Times report reviving talk of treason and a redo of the election , is it wise for Trump to mess with such a respected American tradition? Trump isn't picking a bracket this year. Do people care? ESPN thinks so, placing it in their "Top Headlines" section. Slow news day, guys? 
— Chris Presley (@_ChrisPresley) February 15, 2017 
We need a second source on this … maybe a third. Sounds like more fake news. Donald Trump declines ESPN’s offer to fill out March Madness bracket https://t.co/I4S4l5kvZ1 
— Charlie Spiering (@charliespiering) February 15, 2017 Trump will not fill out an NCAA tournament bracket for ESPN, breaking from Obama's tradition https://t.co/m0ovGbgDJa 
— Washington Post (@washingtonpost) February 16, 2017 @washingtonpost OMG R U SERIOUS WOW
